CommandDefinition.Name: sql
CommandDefinition.Description: Evaluate SELECT/DESCRIBE statements on warehouse tables.

Argument.Name: Statement
Argument.Description: The SELECT/DESCRIBE statement that will be executed. Note that white spaces have to be escaped.

Argument.Name: ConnectionType
Argument.Description: The connection type that the statement will be executed upon. This optional argument will only be used for SELECT statements, the default value if 'DEFAULT'.

BoolOption.Name: t
BoolOption.Description: Lists the output in the form of a well formatted table
